name: Michal Podhradsky's profile page
body:
### Publications
* **An Open-Source Real-Time Rapid Software Prototyping and Testing Platform for Unmanned Aerial System Research and Operations**, _Calvin Coopmans, Michal Podhradsky, Nathan Hoffer, The 2016 International Conference of Unmanned Aircraft Systems (ICUASâ€™16)_ [[PDF]](https://github.com/podhrmic/podhrmic.github.io/blob/master/docs/ICUAS16_0125_FI.pdf)
* **Software and Hardware-in-the-Loop Verification of Flight Dynamics Model and Flight Control Simulation of a Fixed-Wing Unmanned Aerial Vehicle**, _Calvin Coopmans, Michal Podhradsky, Nathan Hoffer, 3rd Workshop on Research, Education and Development of Unmanned Aerial Systems, (RED-UAS 2015)_ [[PDF]](https://github.com/podhrmic/podhrmic.github.io/blob/master/docs/reduas2015_hitl.pdf)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
